import { useState } from "react" import Square from "./Square" const Board = () => { const [square, setSquare] = useState({squares: Array(9).fill(null)}) const clickHandler = (index) => { const sq = square.squares.slice(); sq. setSquare({squares: sq}) } const status = `Следующий ход: X` return (
{status}
) } export default Board
